thread.title: The Best Way to Dry a Toilet Brush After Each Use
thread.title_full: The Best Way to Dry a Toilet Brush After Each Use

author: Patrick Allan
title: The Best Way to Dry a Toilet Brush After Each Use
text:
Go to permalink 
Cleaning a toilet can be gross, but so can the tools you use for the task. If you’ve ever stared down at a wet toilet brush wondering what to do with it, this tip is for you. 
In this video from the Clean My Space YouTube channel , Melissa Maker shares her five best home cleaning tips—including a clever way to dry off a wet toilet brush. After you scrub your toilet bowl down, give the toilet a flush and let the clean water rinse off the brush. Then rest the handle of the brush under the toilet seat so the brush end hangs over the toilet bowl. Once it dries, you can place it back in its home without worrying about bringing a bunch of nasty water with it.
